text: Hagamaamaa ina godou ihoo digau Israel ala i golo, gaa dae loo gi di nadau noho gi hongo di gowaa dela e wanga go Dimaadua ga haganoho digaula i di aumaalia, gadoo be dana hai ne hai adu gi goodou i kinei. Nomuli gei goodou gaa mee di lloomoi gi muli, gi dogu gowaa ne hagaingoo adu gi goodou.’
